snippet.title: Project Utgardr - Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Project Utgardr is an adventure, parkour and puzzle solving game in an old and far land. 
Based on exploration and nordic mythology... 
"This is a non-game and none is playing with it..."


Finally the game Alpha version is coming on Steam and on the other stores.
You could find lots of new zones and also old ones recreated and with lot of nature details.
The story also proceed ahead not only by using your movement skills, but also solving some puzzles on the road. Will they be accessible to everyone?
Also the game mode has been switched from the previous one, to the actual adventure and exploration mode.
Oh, and you've got also some crystals where you can save the game...
Alpha on Steam: 🔵 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1878290/Project_Utgardr


Do not esitate to follow Project Utgardr also here in these stores:
🟤 Itch.io: https://tronusgames.itch.io/project-utgardr
⚪ Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/project-utgardr/673440
⚫ Indie DB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/project-utgardr



Music by Viking Axe Anger - Ean Grimm.
Digital painting by Jonathan Calsolaro.



00:00 - Intro
00:04 - Ancient Road
00:30 - Old Rocks
00:54 - Flowers
01:04 - A forest





Follow the Project Utgardr 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 communities on:
